name: Website Design
des: In 21st century, your website is the first impression of your business. It has to be slick, mobile friendly, fast, responsive and it has to work as a salesperson for your business. Our website package covers it all. It also comes with free logo, domain and hosting so you don’t have to spend extra.
bannerP: We build conversion focused user-friendly websites that reflect your brand and get you more customers.

des1.h1: Turn Your Website Into a Full-Time Salesperson
des1.p1: With our experience of building 240+ websites in different industries, we know what converts. The websites we design are engaging, built to sell and reflects your brand.
des1.p2: All our websites come with free hosting, free SSL security and free revisions, whenever you need something to be changed.

des1.h1: Convert More Website Visitors Into Customers
des1.p1: Your website is not only a digital brochure for your customers to see, but it is also a sales person you can use to your advantage if it is optimized correctly.
des1.p2: Our website designs encourage your visitors to take action by creating landing pages with conversion in mind.

des1.p1: With Google’s mobile first indexing update, Develomark builds out mobile ready websites for our clients. With more visitors searching on a mobile device, your business needs to be at the forefront of where customers are searching.
des1.p2: We keep the audience in mind by making sure our websites are optimized for the ideal mobile user experience.

name: Search Engine Optimization
des: Imagine this. Someone needs a plumber to do a quick job. What do they do? They go to Google and search for plumbers. We place you on the first page of Google so that they can always find you. We help you rank at the top of search engines to get more visibility every time someone searches for your business related topics.

des1.p1: Organic SEO differs from Local SEO in the sense that you’re going for terms that are not localized.  For example, a term like “how to open a pizza restaurant”, is much different than “pizza restaurant near me”.
des1.p2: ith Google changing their algorithm over 300 times a year, we recommend that you consult with a professional agency to execute your SEO campaign.

des1.p1: With a holistic marketing campaign, we help you grow online and start getting results within days. With honest reporting and quality customer service, you will always be well taken care of.
des1.p2: Alongside with contextual backlinks, we work with high quality news links to amplify your marketing efforts. Using local media outlets, we work with producers and PR professionals to get you media placements for long-term growth.

name: Content Service
des: Looking to rank on page 1 with solid content written by experts? We got you covered. Gorilla Digital has the best team of content writers to write blog posts for your website & you know what’s the best part? We write it in a way that ranks on Google.

name: Social Media Management
des: More than 3 billion users log on to Facebook and Instagram every day. We make sure that your brand is visible to them. Managing social media is an art. We create the content, we optimise the content, we run ads to make sure your audience sees your content and we also offer the secret Gorilla Weapon to convert these audience into customers for you.
bannerP: Companies big and small know that to reach a target audience today, we have to invest in social media marketing strategies. With social media, we can make our products and services known not only offline but online as well.

des1.p1: Our social media team will not only keep you active on all social media, but will also make sure that you get engagement, sales and brand visibility online.

Our social media management services offer business owners the ability to step away but also feel confidant they’re achieving their goals. We help brands reach more customers on Facebook using digital advertising at an affordable rate.

name: Google Ads
des: Advertising on Google is one of the quickest ways to get traffic to your website and increase the number of phone calls and leads. Our Google ads service manages the whole campaign for you. We set it up, we optimise it and we deliver you results.
bannerP: With our Google Ad service (PPC and Retargeting + Display), we place you in front of targeted visitors in 3 business days .

des1.p1: With our complete Google ad management service, you can achieve it all.With a holistic marketing campaign, we help you grow online and start getting results within days. With honest reporting and quality customer service, you will always be well taken care of.
